title: What is a computer?
subtitle: A computer is a machine used to calculate data and perform many other tasks such as storing information and processing data.
detail: A computer is an electronic device that accepts data as input, processes the data according to instructions (programs), stores information, and produces output. Computers are widely used for tasks such as calculations, communication, data storage, and running applications.

title: What is Flutter?
subtitle: Flutter is a framework used to create mobile applications. It allows developers to build Android and iOS apps using a single codebase.
detail: Flutter is an open-source UI software development framework created by Google. It is used to build cross-platform applications from a single codebase, including Android, iOS, web, and desktop apps. Flutter focuses on fast development, beautiful user interfaces, and high performance.

title: What is Dart?
subtitle: Dart is the programming language used in Flutter to build mobile applications.
detail: Dart is a programming language developed by Google. It is mainly used with Flutter to build mobile and web applications. Dart is easy to learn, supports object-oriented programming, and provides good performance for modern app development.
